name: Quinn Wheeler
_review: This is a favorite stop for us every time we are here. Most of the visits multiple stops. The ice cream is truly incredible. You can sit inside depending on the time of day but it tends to get packed pretty often and early.

name: Maribel Jackson
_review: This is some of the best ice cream found in this area. Everyone in our group loved it. Mango was the bomb dot com. Others likes coco crunch, coco almond. Service was fast. Staff were very friendly. Shop was very clean. Highly recommend!

name: Kirk Carver
_review: It's freshly made ice cream. The best place to have ice cream in kharghar. The quality is good and worth its price . Hope the price don't increase

name: Jackie Munoz
_review: The Ice Creams are fresh and really tasty.The staff is courteous too. Amidst the array of flavors, the season specials are THE best

name: Grant Murray
_review: Nice Ice Cream shop located in the area Park, an ideal location serves quality ice-creams which attracts many people.

name: Craft Kim
_review: Great fun friendly place with a cool vibe .... Staff is very nice and the food is fresh taste good.... I definitely recommend this place for great ice cream and food  5 stars
